content: this bitty blocks hat is the perfect whimsical addition to your accessory collection wear it with the bitty blocks scarf 1 for a matching set >this pattern is available for free on my website here 2 if you prefer a pdf is also available for purchase 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bitty-blocks-scarf 2 https //makeitcrochet com/bitty-blocks-hat-free-crochet-pattern/
